name: String.Case

values.name: convertCase
values.comment:
Converts string between various case forms such as camel case, snake case or kebab case.
Strings are split into words on capital letters or whitespace.
For example, to convert to space case with the first letter of the first word capitalized and
the first letters of subsequent words in lower case:

    convertCase " " True False "convertToSpaceCase" == "Convert to space case"

values.name: toCamelCaseLower
values.comment: Converts a string to camel case with the first letter in lowercase.

values.name: toCamelCaseUpper
values.comment: Converts a string to camel case with the first letter in uppercase.

values.name: toKebabCaseLower
values.comment: Converts a string to kebab case with the first letter in lowercase.

values.name: toKebabCaseUpper
values.comment: Converts a string to kebab case with the first letter in uppercase.

values.name: toSnakeCaseLower
values.comment: Converts a string to snake case with the first letter in lowercase.

values.name: toSnakeCaseUpper
values.comment: Converts a string to snake case with the first letter in uppercase.
